thread.title_full: Global wearable digital walkie-talkie market worth US $43.5 Mn by 2021: Persistence Market Research

title: Global wearable digital walkie-talkie market worth US $43.5 Mn by 2021: Persistence Market Research
text: This article was posted on 09/30/2015 Global wearable digital walkie-talkie market worth US $43.5 Mn by 2021: Persistence Market Research According to the latest market report published by Persistence Market Research titled “Global Market Study on Wearable Digital Walkie-Talkie: Asia-Pacific to Witness Highest Growth by 2021”, the global wearable digital walkie-talkie market is expected to account for US$ 8.0 Mn by the end of 2015, and is anticipated to expand at a CAGR of 32.6% between 2015 end and 2021 to account for US$ 43.5 Mn. In terms of volume, production of wearable digital walkie-talkie is expected to be 80.0 thousand units by the end of 2015 and is expected to reach 543.2 thousand units by 2021, exhibiting a CAGR of 37.6%.
